TarzanHTTPResponse::isOK ( $  codes = 200  ) 

isOK

Did we receive the status code we expected?

Parameters:
mixed $codes (Optional) The status code(s) to expect. Integer for a single accepted value, or an array of integers for multiple accepted values.
Returns:
boolean Whether we received the expected code or not.
